name: ArticleTopicAssignmentJobInput

fields.name: operation
fields.description: Type of operation to perform on articles and topics. Values are: AssignTopicsToArticle—Assign topics to articles in a data category. UnassignTopicsFromArticle—Unassign topics from articles in a data category.

fields.name: topicNames
fields.description: List of topic names to assign to or unassign from articles.

description: An article and topic assignment job.
